title: Epstein, in emails released by Dems, says Trump 'spent hours at my house'
shortDescription: Accused sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein's emails mentioned Trump repeatedly, according to records House Democrats released.

title: House preps vote on ending government shutdown. Live updates
shortDescription: The House of Representatives will hold a vote to reopen the government on Wednesday.

title: Trump asked Israeli president to pardon Netanyahu, office says
shortDescription: Israel's president received a letter from President Trump, urging him to consider granting a pardon to Benjamin Netanyahu, the president's office said.

title: John F. Kennedy grandson Jack Schlossberg announces run for Congress
shortDescription: John F. Kennedy's grandson Jack Schlossberg, the only son of first daughter Caroline Kennedy, is running to replace New York Rep. Jerry Nadler.

title: Trump attends Arlington Veterans Day ceremony
shortDescription: President Donald Trump attended the Veterans Day wreath-laying ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery with other top officials.

title: Melania 'loved her little tiny office,' Trump says of White House teardown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump weighed in on first lady's Melania Trump's views on the East Wing teardown. Her 'tiny little office' is become the new ballroom.

title: President Trump commemorates Veterans Day at Arlington National Cemetery
shortDescription:
President Trump takes part in a wreath laying ceremony at
Arlington National Cemetery on Veterans Day, Nov. 11, 2025.

title: Russia says it's confused by Trump's nuclear test comments
shortDescription: Russian officials say they are waiting for an explanation from President Donald Trump about nuclear testing. He hasn't given one.

title: Shutdown bill allows senators to sue over subpoenaed phone records
shortDescription: Legislation to end the shutdown includes a provision allowing senators whose phone records were subpoenaed in an election-interference probe to sue.

title: Trump once said he would rename Veterans Day. What is 'Victory Day?'
shortDescription: President Trump had previously said Veterans Day should be renamed to “Victory Day for World War I.” He will be Arlington National Cemetery on Nov. 11
